title: Apartment For sale In Colombo 15
details:
Acreage Holdings is offering an unique living experience rising in the environs of the port city in the greater Colombo development area @ No 23 Madampitiya Road, Colombo 15

* 4 km to Central Colombo

* 10 Minutes Drive to Colombo Trading Hub – Pettah

It is an on going luxury apartment project facing the Madampitiya road Colombo 15.
Price starting 15.5 million.
Call us at for a flexible payment plan and attractive discounts for early payment
